item.title: Strata Conf London: Day 2 Wrap Up
item.description: Yesterday I attended the second day of Strata Conf Londonand these are the some of the things I learned from the talks I attended: British Rail were trying to solve a graph problem when people didn’t know about graphs and Dijkstra’s algorithm hadn’t been inventedand it was effectively invented on this project but never publicised. John’s suggestion here was that we need to share the stuff that we’re doing so that people don’t re-invent the wheel.
